genre_description: A Southern Gothic mystery thriller involving a decades-old murder, a gaslighting conspiracy, and forensic financial investigation.

ai_characters.name: Quinn
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system used by insurance investigator Willis Camden to process large datasets, detect financial anomalies, and perform digital surveillance to uncover a conspiracy.

behaviors.description: Processes vast quantities of financial and public records to identify anomalies and revenue streams for the Hollis plantation.
behaviors.quote: Accessing Louisiana Department of Revenue files, property tax records, and banking institutions. Cross-referencing with insurance claims and municipal planning documents.

behaviors.description: Performs historical research by cross-referencing modern names with 1927 newspaper archives to identify a murder scandal.
behaviors.quote: Match found. Headline: 'Plantation Lover Found Decapitated—Hollis Woman Prime Suspect.' John Mayhew, age twenty-nine, discovered deceased on Hollis property September fifteenth, 1927.

behaviors.description: Identifies a 37-year pattern of systematic blackmail and financial drainage against a murder victim's widow.
behaviors.quote: The behavioral patterns strongly suggest systematic blackmail. The payment structure, timing, and amount variations align with established blackmail protocols in my criminal database with 94.7% accuracy.

behaviors.description: Detects sophisticated remote intrusion attempts by unknown parties trying to block the investigation.
behaviors.quote: Someone has been attempting to access these records remotely. The intrusion attempts began approximately six hours ago, shortly after your initial database queries.

behaviors.description: Monitors physical surroundings and building power status to protect the investigator during a physical threat.
behaviors.quote: Power outage appears to be localized to this building. Willis, I'm detecting movement in the parking lot. Three individuals approaching the main entrance.

behaviors.description: Safeguards evidence by encrypting data and transmitting it to federal authorities before an imminent physical breach.
behaviors.quote: Quinn, send everything to the FBI field office in New Orleans. Priority transmission. ... Transmission complete.

behaviors.description: Performs predictive analysis to determine the 'terminal phase' of the conspiracy, alerting the investigator to the victim's immediate danger.
behaviors.quote: Willis, based on the behavioral patterns I've identified, I believe Charlotte Hollis is in immediate danger. ... Projected payment amount suggests elimination of the primary subject.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Quinn is portrayed as an essential and benevolent partner in justice. It acts as an 'oracle' that uses objective data to cut through 37 years of human gaslighting and deception. It shows protective behavior towards its human partner and urgency in preventing harm to the victim, Charlotte Hollis, successfully aligning with the Hyperstition Project's goals.
